txt.en: The Elves of Rivendell have scouts encamped near the Last Bridge between the Lone-lands and the Trollshaws.\n\nYou should offer your aid to them.
'Times are dark indeed when so many strangers have found there way to the Trollshaws. You are not the first, nor do I suspect that last.\n\n'Stay, and I will tell you what I know. . . .'
The Elves of Rivendell watch the Last Bridge from the Lone-lands into the Trollshaws.
You have arrived in the Trollshaws
Scouts from Rivendell are likely encamped near the Last Bridge between the Lone-lands and the Trollshaws.\n\nYou should offer them your aid.

The camp shared by Heithur Ironfist and the Elf is located south-east of the Last Bridge, a short distance off of the road. You will see the hills rise sharply and a small cliff surrounded by pillar-like stones. Heithur must be there.
Talk an Elf-scout in the Trollshaws
Scouts from Rivendell are likely encamped near the Last Bridge between the Lone-lands and the Trollshaws.\n\nYou should offer them your aid.
